Crewneck Cap sleeves Seamed waist Back tie keyhole and zip closure 100% silk Dry clean Made in Italy SIZE & FIT Model measurements: 5'10" tall Model is wearing a US size 4 ABOUT THE BRAND Max Mara's history of impeccable tailoring dates back to 1850, when founder Achille Maramotti's great-grandmother owned a fashion atelier in Italy. Since its official launch in 1951, incredible craftsmanship has remained an integral part of the label's heritage. Under Creative Director Ian Griffiths, the aesthetic of timeless silhouettes in luxe fabrics continues with sharp suiting, lush wrap coats and sleek accessories. Designer Lifestyle - Max Mara > Max Mara > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. Max Mara. Color: Camel. Size: 2.

This essential addition to your collection is crafted out of a supportive, yet lightweight and buttery soft, blend of organic cotton and spandex. This feminine style is meant to fit tight to body, recommend sizing up if between sizes or for a more generous fit. Whether paired with your favorite jeans for a relaxed look or dressed up with a skirt and statement jewelry for a night out, this tank effortlessly adapts to any occasion.

products.description: Take on the winter chill in a vest designed to add some warmth to your life. Loose enough to layer, its synthetic fill adds insulation while Nike Therma-FIT technology helps manage your body's natural heat to help keep you warm in cold-weather conditions. On top of that, a water-repellent finish helps keep you dry. So zip it up, throw your hands in the pockets and get out there! Keep the Cold Out:Nike Therma-FIT technology helps manage your body's natural heat to help keep you warm in cold-weather conditions. Water-repellent finish helps keep you dry in wet weather. Small-Item Storage:Snap pockets let you keep your small items close—or keep your hands out of the cold. More Benefits:Style: Hip-length, loose-fit vest Materials: Water-repellent fabric Construction: Synthetic insulation Storage: Snap-closure hand pockets Trim: Zipper closure and elastic hem Product Details:100% polyester. Embroidered Swoosh logo. Machine wash. Imported. Pair with sandals and a shoulder bag for grabbing brunch with the girls, or with heels and a clutch for an outdoor cocktail event. products.unbrandedName: Deserto Mini Dress
products.description: Deserto Mini Dress Deserto Mini Dress 93% polyester 7% elastane. Made in China. Dry clean only. Unlined. Adjustable halterneck tie. Plisse fabric with ruched side and draping accent. COEL-WD450. CCD788 U24. Camila Coelho's namesake collection is as bright as the Brazilian sun. The beauty and fashion entrepreneur wanted to create a label that reflects her roots: she was born in Brazil, and lived there until she moved to the States at fourteen. With bold palettes and sexy matching sets, her pieces evoke the feeling of lingering over a caipirinha in Fernando de Noronha or dancing in the colorful streets of Salvador. It's an elevated line for all the girls out there who dream big. More than anything, the Camila Coelho Collection empowers women to be both strong and glamorous; to take on the world in vibrant style, and have fun doing so.

products.name: Denim Ballet Flats, , Navy - Blue
products.brandedName: Alaia Denim Ballet Flats, , Navy - Blue
products.unbrandedName: Denim Ballet Flats, , Navy - Blue
products.description: We are delighted to present to you the incomparable DENIM BALLET FLATS from the esteemed designer ALAÏA, epitomizing casual elegance at its finest. Crafted from the highest quality materials, these flats blend sophisticated style with unparalleled wearing comfort. Their navy hue, inspired by classic denim and combined with a distinctive texture, endows them with a unique character. Beyond their extraordinary design, these ballet flats stand out with functional details. A strap that threads through the center of the foot, finishing with a metallic buckle, not only adds charm but also allows for the perfect fit. Contrasting, red stitching subtly accents their casual, yet stylish look, while the rounded toe shape ensures comfort all day long. Inside, a beige leather lining and the designer's logo attest to the product's authenticity and exclusivity. Thanks to their versatility, these ballet flats will become an indispensable element of every wardrobe, perfectly matching with both everyday and more sophisticated outfits. WHY SHOULD YOU PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT? * A unique blend of CASUAL STYLE with LUXURIOUS CRAFTSMANSHIP * Crafted by the renowned designer ALAÏA, ensuring the highest quality and originality * Adjustable strap with buckle for the perfect fit * Versatility - suitable for a wide range of outfits, from jeans to elegant dresses * Made from the highest quality materials: exterior fabric layer, inner leather lining, rubber sole

products.name: Juliet Shoulder Bag With Tie Dye
products.brandedName: Coach Juliet Shoulder Bag With Tie Dye
products.unbrandedName: Juliet Shoulder Bag With Tie Dye
products.description: Denim and glovetanned leather Inside snap pocket Zip-top closure fabric lining Detachable handle with 11 drop Detachable strap with 21 1/2 drop for shoulder or crossbody wear 12 (L) x 8 3/4 (H) x 4 1/2 (W) Due to the special dye technique there may be variations in shading and color that may fade over time (a groovy sign of character.) Style No. CU040 Timeless with a twist our Juliet is a sophisticated style with a slouchy relaxed shape. Detailed with our Signature hardware the one compartment design is crafted of glovetanned leather and indigo denim specially bleached with our sophisticated spin on a classic tie-dye pattern using a time-intensive technique with no two exactly alike. The versatile style is made with cotton sourced from farms that use regenerative agricultural practices* and inspired by our commitment to reducing our impact on the planet. Featuring an inside pocket to organize essentials it’s finished with a detachable shoulder strap and a detachable crossbody strap for versatile wear. It's sleek spacious stylish functional (basically everything you want in a bag). *Say what? Just the bag itself not the trims and straps. But did you know that regenerative agricultural practices help to maintain and rejuvenate land increase biological diversity and soil health and could lead to increased carbon absorption? (Neat!)
